value.fullName: Mild dehydration (~5%) - Minimal loss of skin turgor, semidry mucous membranes and normal eye
value.label: Mild dehydration (~5%) - Minimal loss of skin turgor, semidry mucous membranes and normal eye

value.fullName: Moderate dehydration (~8%) - Moderate loss of skin turgor, dry mucous membranes, weak rapid pulses, enopthalmus.
value.label: Moderate dehydration (~8%) - Moderate loss of skin turgor, dry mucous membranes, weak rapid pulses, enopthalmus.

value.fullName: Severe dehydration (>10%) - Considerable loss of skin turgor, severe enophthalmos, tachycardia, extremely dry mucous membranes, weak/thready pulses, and altered level of consciousness.
value.label: Severe dehydration (>10%) - Considerable loss of skin turgor, severe enophthalmos, tachycardia, extremely dry mucous membranes, weak/thready pulses, and altered level of consciousness.
